query:
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pets p WHERE p.userId = u.id) as pet_count 
FROM users u 
ORDER BY u.id DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user pKjA5SMDXuoB77s.root --database EAx6gLvU46tT7DLQqEvWYm --execute SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pets p WHERE p.userId = u.id) as pet_count 
FROM users u 
ORDER BY u.id DESC;
